Class Sound

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sound

  • public class Sound
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Class where Sounds are played from and loaded.Since we do not want to keep loading sound file every time its needed, we instead load all sounds at the start of the game and get a reference to it so we can play the sound when needed without latency caused by constantly loading a file.
